alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Jefferson Davis; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 8:09PM CST until February 02 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Neches River at Neches River Saltwater Barrier ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Louisiana... Pine Island Bayou Near Sour Lake West Fork of The Calcasieu River At Sam Houston Jones SP Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Calcasieu River Near Kinder Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Mermentau River Near Mermentau Sabine River Near Deweyville Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday evening at 815 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mermentau River near Mermentau. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon to early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 4.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding near the river will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Sunday the stage was 3.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 4.3 feet early Tuesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Mermentau River Mermentau 4.0 3.8 Sun 7 pm CST 4.1 4.3 4.2 &&
